title: Matrix Scalar Multiplier
name: LGF_MatrixScalarMultiplication
description:
## Short description ##

This function block multiplies a matrix of the data type ARRAY[*,*] of LREAL with a scalar.
A matrix is multiplied by a scalar, thereby multiplying each matrix element by the scalar. The 
result is output in the matrixResult matrix.
Note Note that the input and output matrix must have the same number of columns and rows.

input.name: scalar
input.description: Scalar value where the matrix is multiplied

in/out.name: matrixResult
in/out.description: The result matrix of the multiplication

return_value.description: Void - Function has no return value
